definitions.definition: cross or be crossed intricately together; interweave.
examples: Jane interlaced her fingers to form a cup.
synonyms: punctuate "she was careful to interlace her tough remarks with compliments for the prime minister"

examples: buttercups interlacing their gold with the silver of the daisies
synonyms: punctuate "she was careful to interlace her tough remarks with compliments for the prime minister"

definitions.definition: scan (a video image) in such a way that alternate lines form one sequence that is followed by the other lines in a second sequence.
